verses.verse: <S%H116>Then<s%> <S%H1868>Darius<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H7761>made<s%> a <S%H2942>decree,<s%> and <S%H1240>search<s%> was made in the <S%H1005>house<s%> of the <S%H5609>archives,<s%> <S%H8536>where<s%> the <S%H1596>treasures<s%> were laid <S%H5182>up<s%> in <S%H895>Babylon.<s%>

There was <S%H7912>found<s%> at <S%H307>Achmetha,<s%> in the <S%H1001>palace<s%> that is in the <S%H4083>province<s%> of <S%H4076>Media,<s%> <S%H2298>a<s%> <S%H4040>scroll,<s%> and <S%H1459>therein<s%> was <S%H3652>thus<s%> <S%H3790>written<s%> for a <S%H1799>record:<s%>

In the <S%H2298>first<s%> <S%H8140>year<s%> of <S%H3567>Cyrus<s%> the <S%H4430>king,<s%> <S%H3567>Cyrus<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H7761>made<s%> a <S%H2942>decree:<s%> Concerning the <S%H1005>house<s%> of <S%H426>God<s%> at <S%H3390>Jerusalem,<s%> let the <S%H1005>house<s%> be <S%H1124>built,<s%> the <S%H870>place<s%> where they <S%H1684>offer<s%> <S%H1685>sacrifices,<s%> and let its <S%H787>foundations<s%> be strongly <S%H5446>laid;<s%> its <S%H7314>height<s%> <S%H8361>sixty<s%> <S%H521>cubits,<s%> and its <S%H6613>breadth<s%> <S%H8361>sixty<s%> <S%H521>cubits;<s%>

with <S%H8532>three<s%> <S%H5073>courses<s%> of <S%H1560>great<s%> <S%H69>stones,<s%> and a <S%H5073>course<s%> of <S%H2323>new<s%> <S%H636>timber:<s%> and let the <S%H5313>expenses<s%> be <S%H3052>given<s%> out <S%H4481>of<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%>'s <S%H1005>house.<s%>

<S%H638>Also<s%> let the <S%H1722>gold<s%> and <S%H3702>silver<s%> <S%H3984>vessels<s%> of the <S%H1005>house<s%> of <S%H426>God,<s%> which <S%H5020>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> took <S%H5312>forth<s%> out <S%H4481>of<s%> the <S%H1965>temple<s%> which is at <S%H3390>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%H2987>brought<s%> to <S%H895>Babylon,<s%> be <S%H8421>restored,<s%> and brought <S%H1946>again<s%> to the <S%H1965>temple<s%> which is at <S%H3390>Jerusalem,<s%> everyone to its <S%H870>place;<s%> and you shall <S%H5182>put<s%> them in the <S%H1005>house<s%> of <S%H426>God.<s%>

<S%H3705>Now<s%> <S%H6347>therefore,<s%> Tattenai, governor <S%H5675>beyond<s%> the <S%H5103>River,<s%> <S%H8370>Shetharbozenai,<s%> and your <S%H3675>companions<s%> the <S%H671>Apharsachites,<s%> who are <S%H5675>beyond<s%> the <S%H5103>River,<s%> <S%H1934>you<s%> must stay <S%H7352>far<s%> <S%H4481>from<s%> <S%H8536>there.<s%>

Leave the <S%H5673>work<s%> of <S%H1791>this<s%> <S%H1005>house<s%> of <S%H426>God<s%> <S%H7662>alone;<s%> let the <S%H6347>governor<s%> of the <S%H3062>Jews<s%> and the <S%H7868>elders<s%> of the <S%H3062>Jews<s%> <S%H1124>build<s%> <S%H1791>this<s%> <S%H1005>house<s%> of <S%H426>God<s%> <S%H5922>in<s%> its <S%H870>place.<s%>

Moreover <S%H4481>I<s%> <S%H7761>make<s%> a <S%H2942>decree<s%> <S%H3964>what<s%> you shall <S%H5648>do<s%> <S%H5974>to<s%> <S%H479>these<s%> <S%H7868>elders<s%> of the <S%H3062>Jews<s%> for the <S%H1124>building<s%> of <S%H1791>this<s%> <S%H1005>house<s%> of <S%H426>God:<s%> that of the <S%H4430>king<s%>'s <S%H5232>goods,<s%> even <S%H1768>of<s%> the <S%H4061>tribute<s%> <S%H5675>beyond<s%> the <S%H5103>River,<s%> <S%H5313>expenses<s%> <S%H1934>be<s%> <S%H3052>given<s%> with all <S%H629>diligence<s%> to <S%H479>these<s%> <S%H1400>men,<s%> that they be <S%H3809>not<s%> <S%H989>hindered.<s%>

That <S%H4101>which<s%> they have need <S%H2818>of,<s%> both <S%H1123>young<s%> <S%H8450>bulls,<s%> and <S%H1798>rams,<s%> and <S%H563>lambs,<s%> for burnt <S%H5928>offerings<s%> to the <S%H426>God<s%> of <S%H8065>heaven;<s%> also <S%H2591>wheat,<s%> <S%H4416>salt,<s%> <S%H2562>wine,<s%> and <S%H4887>oil,<s%> according to the word of the <S%H3549>priests<s%> who <S%H1934>are<s%> at <S%H3390>Jerusalem,<s%> let it <S%H1934>be<s%> <S%H3052>given<s%> them <S%H3118>day<s%> by <S%H3118>day<s%> <S%H3809>without<s%> <S%H7960>fail;<s%>

that they may <S%H1934>offer<s%> sacrifices of pleasant <S%H5208>aroma<s%> to the <S%H426>God<s%> of <S%H8065>heaven,<s%> and <S%H6739>pray<s%> for the <S%H2417>life<s%> of the <S%H4430>king,<s%> and of his <S%H1123>sons.<s%>

<S%H4481>Also<s%> I have <S%H7761>made<s%> a <S%H2942>decree,<s%> that <S%H3606>whoever<s%> shall <S%H8133>alter<s%> <S%H1836>this<s%> <S%H6600>word,<s%> let a <S%H636>beam<s%> be pulled <S%H5256>out<s%> <S%H4481>from<s%> his <S%H1005>house,<s%> and let him be lifted <S%H2211>up<s%> and <S%H4223>fastened<s%> <S%H5922>thereon;<s%> and let his <S%H1005>house<s%> be <S%H5648>made<s%> a <S%H5122>dunghill<s%> <S%H5922>for<s%> <S%H1836>this:<s%>

and the <S%H426>God<s%> who has caused his <S%H8036>name<s%> to <S%H7932>dwell<s%> <S%H8536>there<s%> overthrow <S%H3606>all<s%> <S%H4430>kings<s%> and <S%H5972>peoples<s%> who shall <S%H7972>put<s%> forth their <S%H3028>hand<s%> to <S%H8133>alter<s%> the <S%H2255>same,<s%> to destroy <S%H1791>this<s%> <S%H1005>house<s%> of <S%H426>God<s%> which <S%H576>is<s%> at <S%H3390>Jerusalem.<s%> <S%H576>I<s%> <S%H1868>Darius<s%> have <S%H7761>made<s%> a <S%H2942>decree;<s%> let it be <S%H5648>done<s%> with all <S%H629>diligence.<s%>

<S%H116>Then<s%> <S%H6347>Tattenai,<s%> the governor <S%H5675>beyond<s%> the <S%H5103>River,<s%> <S%H8370>Shetharbozenai,<s%> and their <S%H3675>companions,<s%> <S%H3660>because<s%> <S%H1868>Darius<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%> had <S%H7972>sent<s%> a <S%H5648>decree,<s%> did <S%H6903>accordingly<s%> with all <S%H629>diligence.<s%>

The <S%H7868>elders<s%> of the <S%H3062>Jews<s%> <S%H1124>built<s%> and <S%H6744>prospered,<s%> through the <S%H5017>prophesying<s%> of <S%H2292>Haggai<s%> the <S%H5029>prophet<s%> and <S%H2148>Zechariah<s%> the <S%H1247>son<s%> of <S%H5714>Iddo.<s%> They <S%H1124>built<s%> and <S%H3635>finished<s%> <S%H4481>it,<s%> according to the <S%H2941>commandment<s%> of the <S%H426>God<s%> of <S%H3479>Israel,<s%> and according to the <S%H2942>decree<s%> of <S%H3567>Cyrus,<s%> and <S%H1868>Darius,<s%> and <S%H783>Artaxerxes<s%> <S%H4430>king<s%> of <S%H6540>Persia.<s%>

<S%H1836>This<s%> <S%H1005>house<s%> was <S%H3319>finished<s%> <S%H5705>on<s%> the <S%H8532>third<s%> <S%H3118>day<s%> of the <S%H3393>month<s%> <S%H144>Adar,<s%> which <S%H1932>was<s%> in the <S%H8353>sixth<s%> <S%H8140>year<s%> of the <S%H4437>reign<s%> of <S%H1868>Darius<s%> the <S%H4437>king.<s%>

The <S%H1123>children<s%> of <S%H3479>Israel,<s%> the <S%H3549>priests,<s%> and the <S%H3879>Levites,<s%> and the <S%H7606>rest<s%> of the <S%H1123>children<s%> of the <S%H1547>captivity,<s%> <S%H5648>kept<s%> the <S%H2597>dedication<s%> of <S%H1836>this<s%> <S%H1005>house<s%> of <S%H426>God<s%> with <S%H2305>joy.<s%>

They <S%H6966>set<s%> the <S%H3549>priests<s%> in their <S%H6392>divisions,<s%> and the <S%H3879>Levites<s%> in their <S%H6392>courses,<s%> <S%H5922>for<s%> the <S%H5673>service<s%> of <S%H426>God,<s%> which is at <S%H3390>Jerusalem;<s%> as it is <S%H3792>written<s%> in the <S%H5609>book<s%> of <S%H4873>Moses.<s%>
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H1473>captivity<s%> <S%H6213>kept<s%> the <S%H6453>Passover<s%> on the <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> day of the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month.<s%>

For the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> had <S%H2891>purified<s%> themselves <S%H259>together;<s%> all of them were <S%H2889>pure:<s%> and they <S%H7819>killed<s%> the <S%H6453>Passover<s%> for all the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H1473>captivity,<s%> and for their <S%H251>brothers<s%> the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> and for themselves.

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> who had come <S%H7725>again<s%> out of the <S%H1473>captivity,<s%> and all such as had <S%H914>separated<s%> themselves to them from the <S%H2932>filthiness<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> to <S%H1875>seek<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H398>ate,<s%>

and <S%H6213>kept<s%> the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of unleavened <S%H4682>bread<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> with <S%H8057>joy:<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> had made them <S%H8055>joyful,<s%> and had <S%H5437>turned<s%> the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> to <S%H2388>them,<s%> to strengthen their <S%H3027>hands<s%> in the <S%H4399>work<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
